title: Heres an idea for the forums. they still seem quiet, very dull and odd.
body:
the 'log in' needs attention. every time u log in u have to change the region from NA to OCE, iv spend a good 5 - 6 log ins b4 i realized it was set to the wrong region. i can only assume that new forum members may give up trying to log in to comment.

merge the forums as 1. its so dead its pointless having 6 options.

change the arrow system to a simple "liked". the arrow system doesn't seem to work looks flawed. well not used etc. 
have the button and the end of a post where u can click u have liked. instead of having to scroll up to find it.

all ideas to make forums better.

replies.body:
you can go to NA boards and post on them, if you have an OCE, EUW or EUNE account.
if you don't want to have to relog everytime, just don't log out. it's that simple.

there's nothing wrong with the arrow vote system. it's better like that in fact, because you can read the content of the thread and downvote it without needing to open it.
